document_data.mainbody:
uldathen nectar, sometimes called Guldathan nectar, was an expensive elven wine from the Forest of Tethir popular in Waterdeep and Daggerford.
In 1363 DR, Guldathen nectar was served at the Elfstone Tavern of Waterdeep. In 1372 DR, this elven wine could be purchased in the Happy Cow of Daggerford.
